cards.name: Highcliff Felidar
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Highcliff Felidar enters the battlefield, for each opponent, choose a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls. Destroy those creatures.
cards.flavor: Once the felidar has marked you as prey, there's no point in running.

cards.name: Sphinx of Enlightenment
cards.text:
Flying
When Sphinx of Enlightenment enters the battlefield, target opponent draws a card and you draw three cards.
cards.flavor: "I would be a fool if I taught you everything I know."

cards.name: Calculating Lich
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever a creature attacks one of your opponents, that player loses 1 life.
cards.flavor: "We share a common enemy. Does that not make us friends?"

cards.name: Fiendish Duo
cards.text:
First strike
If a source would deal damage to an opponent, it deals double that damage to that player instead.
cards.flavor: Half the size, double the mayhem.

cards.name: Earthshaker Giant
cards.text:
Trample
When Earthshaker Giant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Come, my wild children. Let's give the interlopers a woodland welcome."

cards.name: Consul's Lieutenant
cards.text:
First strike
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
Whenever Consul's Lieutenant attacks, if it's renowned, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Fiend Binder
cards.text: Whenever Fiend Binder attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
cards.flavor: She had not believed any shred of humanity remained in these writhing monsters until the twisted form of her partner appeared before her.

cards.name: Kytheon's Irregulars
cards.text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
{W}{W}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: Kytheon and his irregulars worked outside the law to bring justice to the streets of Akros.

cards.name: Mighty Leap
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "I feel the presence of the God-Pharaoh in the Second Sun, and I rise upon its rays."

cards.name: Patron of the Valiant
cards.text:
Flying
When Patron of the Valiant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: "Bant's most gallant knights wear my sigil, and for that I am humbled."

cards.name: Relief Captain
cards.text: When Relief Captain enters the battlefield, support 3. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three other target creatures.)
cards.flavor: Sometimes gestures of support are small. Sometimes not.

cards.name: Steppe Glider
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
{1}{W}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying and vigilance until end of turn.

cards.name: Take Vengeance
cards.text: Destroy target tapped creature.
cards.flavor: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."

cards.name: Topan Freeblade
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
cards.flavor: "My scars are my sigils. I will wear them with pride long after you're gone."

cards.name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
cards.text: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible
cards.flavor: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.

cards.name: Aven Wind Mage
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Aven Wind Mage gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "My skill sharpens with each beat of my wings."

cards.name: Claustrophobia
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
cards.flavor: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

cards.name: Cryptic Serpent
cards.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: It slithers through the senses, constricting consciousness and poisoning perceptions.

cards.name: Decision Paralysis
cards.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor:
"Eyes see only what is possible. A trained mind can explore the impossible."
-Kefnet, god of knowledge

cards.name: Dramatic Reversal
cards.text: Untap all nonland permanents you control.
cards.flavor:
"Nobody asked you to butt in, Jace. But thanks."
-Chandra Nalaar

cards.name: Engulf the Shore
cards.text: Return to their owners' hands all creatures with toughness less than or equal to the number of Islands you control.
cards.flavor:
"The tides have begun to ignore the moon."
-Tamiyo's journal

cards.name: Galestrike
cards.text:
Return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Strong wings make strong winds.

cards.name: Rise from the Tides
cards.text: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"Dear brother, it's sweet that you have chosen to share your toys with Ludevic, but I too have found some new playmates."
-Ghoulcaller Gisa

cards.name: River's Rebuke
cards.text: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Carefully following the thaumatic compass Bolas had given her, Vraska blundered straight into the River Heralds' trap.

cards.name: Salvager of Secrets
cards.text: When Salvager of Secrets enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: The greatest treasure of the deep is an echo from above.

cards.name: Accursed Horde
cards.text: {1}{B}: Target attacking Zombie gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

cards.name: Carrion Screecher
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: The banished have come home to roost.

cards.name: Crow of Dark Tidings
cards.text:
Flying
When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Gavony Unhallowed
cards.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gavony Unhallowed.
cards.flavor:
"We entered the church in search of solace, but it became clear we wouldn't find it there."
-Grete, Order of Saint Traft

cards.name: Grasp of Darkness
cards.text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"I welcome the use of even the foulest magic if it will rid us of the monstrosities that plague our world."
-Munda, ambush leader

cards.name: Liliana's Mastery
cards.text:
Zombies you control get +1/+1.
When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
cards.flavor: "There are so many of them. It seems they've just been waiting for someone to serve."

cards.name: Lord of the Accursed
cards.text:
Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The Curse of Wandering leaves only hatred.

cards.name: Rise from the Grave
cards.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
cards.flavor:
"Death is no excuse for disobedience."
-Liliana Vess

cards.name: Tattered Mummy
cards.text: When Tattered Mummy dies, each opponent loses 2 life.
cards.flavor: The dead who wander beyond the safety of the city crave only to spread their curse.

cards.name: Torgaar, Famine Incarnate
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed this way.
When Torgaar, Famine Incarnate enters the battlefield, up to one target player's life total becomes half their starting life total, rounded down.

cards.name: Akoum Hellkite
cards.text:
Flying
Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellkite deals 1 damage to any target. If that land is a Mountain, Akoum Hellkite deals 2 damage instead.

cards.name: Brute Strength
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: It's not the size of the rock. It's how badly you want to lift it.

cards.name: Destructive Tampering
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy target artifact.
• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
cards.flavor:
"I don't think they'll appreciate my . . . adjustments."
-Karavin, renegade saboteur

cards.name: Dragon Egg
cards.text:
Defender
When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
cards.flavor: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

cards.name: Kargan Dragonrider
cards.text: As long as you control a Dragon, Kargan Dragonrider has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cards.flavor: "Only those who give the dragons the respect they deserve may bear our title."

cards.name: Lathliss, Dragon Queen
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
{1}{R}: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Lightning Strike
cards.text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: To wield lightning is to tame chaos.

cards.name: Sparktongue Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: Fools believe that Kolaghan's brood follows lightning storms. The wise know that it is the other way around.

cards.name: Voldaren Duelist
cards.text:
Haste
When Voldaren Duelist enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
cards.flavor: "I have yet to find my equal."

cards.name: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh
cards.text: {4}{R}: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: The God-Pharaoh's most devoted took it upon themselves to follow his example.

cards.name: Crested Herdcaller
cards.text:
Trample
When Crested Herdcaller enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
cards.flavor:
"Our survival, like theirs, depends on our ability to work together."
-Huatli, to Tishana

cards.name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
cards.text:
This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.
Trample
cards.flavor: The earth walks, strongest of all.

cards.name: Grazing Whiptail
cards.text: Reach
cards.flavor: Often found browsing on the upper canopies of Ixalan's jungles, whiptails are known to absently bat away anything foolish enough to interrupt their meal.

cards.name: Ranging Raptors
cards.text: Enrage - Whenever Ranging Raptors is dealt damage, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: They cover their territory like a tide of teeth and claws.

cards.name: Ripjaw Raptor
cards.text: Enrage - Whenever Ripjaw Raptor is dealt damage, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Raptors are clever enough to tear away a hard metal shell to get at the tasty morsel inside.

cards.name: Spidery Grasp
cards.text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+4 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor:
"Nobody's seen the Lady of Videns for years. Poor dear, no companions at all in that old castle."
-Yonda of Gavony

cards.name: Thunderherd Migration
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand or pay {1}.
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: The herds follow as new growth arises.

cards.name: Thundering Spineback
cards.text:
Other Dinosaurs you control get +1/+1.
{5}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
cards.flavor:
"It appears that nature has risen against us."
-Captain Brinely Rage

cards.name: Howling Golem
cards.text: Whenever Howling Golem attacks or blocks, each player draws a card.
cards.flavor: It wails of buried riches and the souls lost seeking them.
